title: murugan tirunAmattai manamE
sahitya:
murugan tirunAmattai manamE dinamum nI karudi vara maravAdE paravasham uravE


anupallavi

  harahara muruganE tirumAl maruganE guruparak-kumaranE guhanE enavOdi


caraNam    nilaiyAga ninru nI kulaiyAdu inimEl alaiyAdu kuvindu amaidiyAi irundu
malai balamIdilum alai kaDal arugilum mahimai mighundE tigazhndu amarnda
